page.title: 16A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Gorsemoor County Primary school. There are six classes two infant classes and four junior classes. The two infant teachers are called Mrs Shaw and Mrs Lomas and the four junior teachers are called Mrs Gibson, Mrs Muddell, Mrs Jackson and Mrs Wilkes.Our headmaster is called Mr. Tilney. We use one of the classrooms as a music room. Our music teacher is called Mr. McCourt, she comes every Wednesday. On a Monday a lady called Mrs Cherry comes in to teach violin. We have a library. It is a place where you can borrow reference books to help you with your work. Reference books are full of information.Our playground is in three parts.One part has different games painted on it,one part has a netball pitch and the third part has a five a side football pitch. We also have a field.
